WebsitePortfolio.tests module

WebsitePortfolio.urls module

WebsitePortfolio.views module

WebsitePortfolio.views.about(request)[source]

Renders the about.html template.

WebsitePortfolio.views.authenticate_user(request)[source]

Authenticates user with provided credentials and redirects to the index page if the credentials are valid. If not, redirects to the login page with an error message.

WebsitePortfolio.views.book_tickets(request)[source]

Renders the book_ticket.html template.

WebsitePortfolio.views.detail(request, question_id)[source]

Displays the details of a specific question.

WebsitePortfolio.views.home(request)[source]

Takes the user to the homepage/renders index.html.

WebsitePortfolio.views.index(request)[source]

Renders the index.html template.

WebsitePortfolio.views.logout_view(request)[source]

Logs out the current user and redirects to the login page.

WebsitePortfolio.views.photos(request)[source]

Renders the photos.html template.

WebsitePortfolio.views.register(request)[source]

Registers a new user with provided credentials and redirects to the index page when successful. If any required fields are empty or passwords do not match, redirects to the register page with an error message.

WebsitePortfolio.views.results(request, question_id)[source]

Displays the results of a specific question.

WebsitePortfolio.views.submit_ticket(request)[source]

Submits a new ticket form, creates a new instance of the Ticket model, and redirects to the index page when successful.

WebsitePortfolio.views.user_login(request)[source]

Renders the login.html template.

WebsitePortfolio.views.vote(request, question_id)[source]

Saves the users selection to the database.
